data.message: im turning into something worse i dont want to hurt anyone these danting thoughts of suicide and my ptsd btw thanks man i never thought id ever see the day when a good message that i wrote is sold in stores everywhere it just sucks that i cant even afford to buy my own cds lol i got over ten of them man rock rap hip hop alternative even country music itd be awesome to see what could come out of a collab that i could throw together if anything one hell of a partty
